headline: 3 High-Flying Stocks We’re Skeptical Of
summary: Expensive stocks typically earn their valuations through superior growth rates that other companies simply can’t match. The flip side though is that these lofty expectations make them particularly susceptible to drawdowns when market sentiment shifts.

raw.headline: 3 High-Flying Stocks We’re Skeptical Of

headline: Assessing ThredUp After a 1,036% Run and New Nike Partnership in 2025
summary: If you're wondering what to make of ThredUp stock right now, you're not alone. With a rollercoaster past and an eye-popping 1,036.2% gain over the past year, this resale platform is turning heads and dividing opinions. Its recent 7-day return sits at -1.0%, and the last month has seen a steeper drop of -14.3%. Yet, when you pull out to the year-to-date view, ThredUp’s shares have soared over 500%, underscoring that something big has changed in how the market values the company. A lot of this...
